explosives.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive properties present in the molecules.

self_reactive_substances.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive or self-reactive properties present in the molecule.

self_heating_substances.rationale: The test suitable for the solid with a melting point of 140 degC or less has not been established. (98.9 degC of melting points)

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures, which in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: The chemical structure of the substance does not contain metals or metaloids(B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At).

oxidizing_solids.rationale: Organic compounds containing chlorine (but not oxygen and fluorine) and the chlorine is chemically bonded only to carbon (but not to other elements).

corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Test methods applicable to solid substances are not available (Melting point: 98.9degC)

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: In two Acute Oral Toxicity tests in rats, we compared the LD50 values for male and female rats. Then for the lower of these groups we compared the LD50 values between the two tests, and selected the lower of the two. Based on the value LD50 = 146mg/kg (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), which was the lower value of the data from the two tests, the substance was classified as Category 3.

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: It was set as the outside of Category based on the description (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) that rat dermal LD50 >2000mg/kg and there is no death.

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: There are all 2 examinations of rat acute inhalation study. But they are not able to calculate LC50 value (EU Endpoints List Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it cannot be classified.

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: In the primary skin irritation test using a rabbit, it carried out the outside of Category based on the statement that there is no irritation (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data).

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: Due to the description that it has no irritation in the eye irritation tests using rabbit (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it was set as the out of Category.

respiratory_skin_sensitizer.classification: Respiratory sensitization: Classification not possible; Skin sensitization: Not classified
respiratory_skin_sensitizer.rationale: Respiratory sensitization: no data available. Skin sensitization: based on the statement (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) with negativity by the Maximization method of a guinea pig, it carried out the outside of Category.

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: There is no data of human multi generation epidemiology, multi generation mutagenicity test, and germ cell in vivo mutagenicity test, and there is the description that both of the result of 2 somatic cell in vivo mutagenicity test are negative (chromosome aberration using rat bone marrow cells and small core test using mouse bone marrow cells) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data). So it is classified as the out of the Category.

carcinogenicity.rationale: In two carcinogenicity tests in rat and mouse, based on the description that generating of treatment-related increased tumor was not observed in each examination (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it was out of the Category.

toxic_to_reproduction.rationale: By two teratogenicity tests using rats and rabbits, there is a publication that teratogenicity was not admitted by all (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data). Moreover, although there was a statement the inhibition of fetal animals' weight gains and hepatocyte hypertrophy were seen in two reproduction toxicity examinations using a rat in the dose which indicates general toxicity to parental animals, but no influence on reproduction was seen (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, EPA FACT SHEET). The effect on a child animal was considered as a secondary effect of general toxicity on parental animals. Based on the above information, it was set as the outside of Category.

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: It was considered as Category 1(nerve systems) based on the description (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data ) that tremor, squatting position, hyporeactivity, decubitus position, abdominal position, salivation, urinary incontinence, ataxy, dacryorrhea, dilatation of pupil, and clonic convulsion were observed in a rat at the dose within the range of guidance value in Category 1 (less than 300mg/kg).

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_statement: May cause damage to organs (liver, thyroid gland) through prolonged or repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: Because of the description that confirmation of increases in thyroid and liver weights, hepatocyte hypertrophy, decreased weight gain, and an increase of total cholesterol, with doses within the limits of the guidance value (10 - 100mg/kg) in Category 2 and higher in the repeated dose oral toxicity study with rats and mice (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it was classified into Category 2 (liver, thyroid gland).

acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It was classified into Category 3 from 48-hour EC50=77mg/L of Crustacea (Daphnia magna) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, 1995).

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_statement: Harmful to aquatic life with long lasting effects
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Classified into Category 3, since acute toxicity was Category 3 and rapid degradability and bioaccumulation potential are unknown.
